message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500.  It's a great deal, and I think you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $8,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but unfortunately I can't go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $9,000.  It's still a good deal for you, and it's closer to what I need. Let me know if you're interested.

Hello Alice, I've considered your latest offer. While I understand your position, I'm still not able to move beyond $8,000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
